definition: to overtake/to catch up with/to hurry/to rush/to try to catch (the bus etc)/to drive (cattle etc) forward/to drive (sb) away/to avail oneself of (an opportunity)/until

sentences.english: Take my word for it that driving sheep is like pushing a loaded supermarket trolley.
sentences.chinese: 我可以保證，趕羊就像推一輛滿載的超市購物車。

sentences.english: He is very ser…intent about moving sheep.
So dogs were used for driving sheep and guarding chickens.
sentences.chinese: 於是狗又被用於趕羊和護雞。
